author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes from `DataFormats` the phase2 IT pixel clusters introduced in 2016 in preparation of the TRK TDR (similarly to Phase2TrackerCluster introduced for OT) but then not used.
The producer class has been already removed in PR #19360.
Please be aware from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19360#issuecomment-310103329
of possible issues occurring when removing the package that may require a full build. 

#### PR validation:

It compiles and passes `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all -j 8 -t 4 --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not a backport.
cc:
@emiglior @pwittich
title: remove obsolete phase2 inner tracker clusters
